step.message: Hahaha, is that who i think it is! My good old friend Elvis. Hows it been old pal?
I’ve been splendid, How is the search for your son gone?
Sigh, still no luck. I’m starting to lose hope. One day he goes into the woods and he is just gone. It’s heartbreaking...

Ah- Don't dwell on it old pal, whatever you need, more soldiers, more materials, I’ll get it to you. Though let’s shift our hearts to a more light topic, shall we? My son is finally 18! Time flies doesn’t it

You’re kidding! ah- I remember when it was just me and you, best friends, buying our first set. Now we are grown men, and look at you. My bestfriend is the leader of this old village. Who would’ve Guessed.
Makes you feel old doesn’t it?
Yea, i guess it does. Anyway, So what is it you want (player) I’ve got anything you can possibly want here.
